      • updateEntityFromDto

        <DTO,​O> O updateEntityFromDto​(O original,
                                    DTO dto,
                                    java.lang.Class<O> originalClass)
        Takes a detached original entity object and updates it fields according to DTO values.
        NOTE: method does not set null values.
        Type Parameters:
        DTO - Class of the corresponding DTO
        O - Original object class
        Parameters:
        original - Object we want to update with its DTO
        dto - DTO object which contains new values for setting
        originalClass - Class of the original object
        Returns:
        original object with updated fields

      • getMapOfObjectFieldsAndValues

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getMapOfObjectFieldsAndValues​(SelectionDto model)
        Converting an instance of SelectionDto, which is the model to select arguments values from, into a map

        NOTE: Use only primitive types, boxed types, parsable types like LocalDate or Enum in SelectionDto so that it could be selected within one table's line without joins.

        Parameters:
        model - an instance of any SelectionDto intended only for extracting values for query
        Returns:
        Map that contains String fieldName as key and Object fieldValue as value
        Since:
        2022-08-17
